languages.text: "Простите, если сказала что-то не так, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Епископ Антиохий говорил, что Бог-Император держит Ключ всех Судеб в своей звездной длани. Сам же Он восседает на самой-самой верхушке Великой Башни Человечества, взирая оттуда на миры и звезды своих владений. Всех видит Он, всех знает — и кровавая слеза катится по его щеке, когда читает Он в летописи жизней наших постыдные мысли и деяния".

traits.locale_text: "Простите, если сказала что-то не так, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Епископ Антиохий говорил нам, что Бог-Император держит Ключ всех Судеб в своей звездной длани. Сам же Он восседает на самой-самой верхушке Великой Башни Человечества, взирая оттуда на миры и звезды своих владений. Всех видит Он, всех знает — и кровавая слеза катится по его щеке, когда читает Он в летописи жизней наших постыдные мысли и деяния".

languages.text: "Forgive me if I've said something wrong, my {mf|lord|lady}. Preacher Antiochus said that the God-Emperor holds the Key to all Destinies in His celestial hand. He Himself sits at the very top of the Great Tower of Humankind, from there gazing out over the worlds and stars of His domain. He sees all, knows all, and a bloody tear rolls down His cheek when He reads our shameful thoughts and deeds in the annals of our lives."
languages.original_text: "Простите, если сказала что-то не так, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Епископ Антиохий говорил, что Бог-Император держит Ключ всех Судеб в своей звездной длани. Сам же Он восседает на самой-самой верхушке Великой Башни Человечества, взирая оттуда на миры и звезды своих владений. Всех видит Он, всех знает — и кровавая слеза катится по его щеке, когда читает Он в летописи жизней наших постыдные мысли и деяния".

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me if I've said something wrong, my {mf|lord|lady}. Reverend Antiochus said that the God-Emperor holds the Key to all Destinies in his celestial hand. He Himself sits at the very top of the Great Tower of Humankind, from there gazing out over the worlds and stars of His domain. He sees all, knows all, and a bloody tear rolls down His cheek when He reads our shameful thoughts and deeds in the annals of our lives."

He Himself sits at the very top of the Great Tower of Humankind, from there gazing out over the worlds and stars of His domain. He sees all, knows all, and a bloody tear rolls down His cheek when He reads our shameful thoughts and deeds in the annals of our lives."

languages.text: “如果我说错了话，请您原谅，大人。布道士安提奥卡斯曾说过，神皇手中掌握着一切命运的钥匙。祂端坐在人类之塔的最顶端，从那里眺望着祂的帝国疆域内的一切世界与群星。祂无所不知，无所不晓。每当祂看到我们脑中卑劣的思想，看到我们犯下可耻的行为时，祂的脸颊就会流下血泪。”
languages.original_text: "Forgive me if I've said something wrong, my {mf|lord|lady}. Preacher Antiochus said that the God-Emperor holds the Key to all Destinies in His celestial hand. He Himself sits at the very top of the Great Tower of Humankind, from there gazing out over the worlds and stars of His domain. He sees all, knows all, and a bloody tear rolls down His cheek when He reads our shameful thoughts and deeds in the annals of our lives."

traits.locale_text: “如果我说错了话，请您原谅，大人。布道士安提奥卡斯曾说过，神皇手中掌握着一切命运的钥匙。祂端坐在人类之塔的最顶端，从那里眺望着祂的帝国疆域内的一切世界与群星。祂无所不知，无所不晓。每当祂看到我们脑中卑劣的思想，看到我们犯下可耻的行为时，祂的脸颊就会流下血泪。”

languages.text: «Perdóneme si he dicho algo fuera de lugar, {mf|milord|milady}. El predicador Antíoco decía que el Dios Emperador portaba la Llave de todos los Destinos en Su mano celestial. Él está sentado en la cima de la Gran Torre de la Humanidad, desde donde proyecta su mirada sobre los mundos y estrellas que conforman Sus dominios. Él lo ve todo y lo sabe todo, y una lágrima de sangre resbala por Su mejilla cuando lee nuestros pensamientos y actos más deshonrosos en los anales de nuestras vidas».
languages.original_text: "Forgive me if I've said something wrong, my {mf|lord|lady}. Preacher Antiochus said that the God-Emperor holds the Key to all Destinies in His celestial hand. He Himself sits at the very top of the Great Tower of Humankind, from there gazing out over the worlds and stars of His domain. He sees all, knows all, and a bloody tear rolls down His cheek when He reads our shameful thoughts and deeds in the annals of our lives."

traits.locale_text: «Perdóneme si he dicho algo fuera de lugar, {mf|milord|milady}. El predicador Antíoco decía que el Dios Emperador portaba la Llave de todos los Destinos en Su mano celestial. Él está sentado en la cima de la Gran Torre de la Humanidad, desde donde proyecta su mirada sobre los mundos y estrellas que conforman Sus dominios. Él lo ve todo y lo sabe todo, y una lágrima de sangre resbala por Su mejilla cuando lee nuestros pensamientos y actos más deshonrosos en los anales de nuestras vidas».

languages.text: "Yanlış bir şey söylediysem affedin {mf|lordum|leydim}. Vaiz Antiochus, Tanrı İmparator'un Tüm Kaderlerin Anahtarı'nı semavi elinde tuttuğunu söylemişti. İnsanlığın Yüce Kulesi'nin tepesinde oturur, oradan egemenliğindeki dünyaları ve yıldızları izlermiş. Her şeyi görür, her şeyi bilir ve yaşamlarımızın yıllıklarında bizim utanç verici düşüncelerimizi ve eylemlerimizi okuduğunda yanağından kanlı bir gözyaşı süzülürmüş."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me if I've said something wrong, my {mf|lord|lady}. Preacher Antiochus said that the God-Emperor holds the Key to all Destinies in His celestial hand. He Himself sits at the very top of the Great Tower of Humankind, from there gazing out over the worlds and stars of His domain. He sees all, knows all, and a bloody tear rolls down His cheek when He reads our shameful thoughts and deeds in the annals of our lives."

traits.locale_text: "Yanlış bir şey söylediysem affedin {mf|lordum|leydim}. Vaiz Antiochus, Tanrı İmparator'un Tüm Kaderlerin Anahtarı'nı semavi elinde tuttuğunu söylemişti. İnsanlığın Yüce Kulesi'nin tepesinde oturur, oradan egemenliğindeki dünyaları ve yıldızları izlermiş. Her şeyi görür, her şeyi bilir ve yaşamlarımızın yıllıklarında bizim utanç verici düşüncelerimizi ve eylemlerimizi okuduğunda yanağından kanlı bir gözyaşı süzülürmüş."

languages.text: 「天の{mf|君|姫}、もし私が何か間違ったことを申し上げたなら、お許しください。プリーチャー・アンティオコスは、神帝陛下がその天の手の中にすべての運命の鍵を握られていると仰いました。陛下自身は、偉大な人類の塔の頂上にいらっしゃり、そこから陛下の領地である惑星や星々を見ておられるそうです。陛下はすべてを見ており、すべてを知り、私たちの生活の中に恥ずべき思想や行いを読み取られると血の涙を流されるということです」
languages.original_text: "Forgive me if I've said something wrong, my {mf|lord|lady}. Preacher Antiochus said that the God-Emperor holds the Key to all Destinies in His celestial hand. He Himself sits at the very top of the Great Tower of Humankind, from there gazing out over the worlds and stars of His domain. He sees all, knows all, and a bloody tear rolls down His cheek when He reads our shameful thoughts and deeds in the annals of our lives."

traits.locale_text: 「天の{mf|君|姫}、もし私が何か間違ったことを申し上げたなら、お許しください。プリーチャー・アンティオコスは、神帝陛下がその天の手の中にすべての運命の鍵を握られていると仰いました。陛下自身は、偉大な人類の塔の頂上にいらっしゃり、そこから陛下の領地である惑星や星々を見ておられるそうです。陛下はすべてを見ており、すべてを知り、私たちの生活の中に恥ずべき思想や行いを読み取られると血の涙を流されるということです」

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi si j'ai dit quelque chose de mal, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. Le prêcheur Antiochus dit que l'Empereur-Dieu détient les clés de tous les destins dans Ses mains célestes. Assis au sommet de la grande tour de l'humanité, Il contemple les mondes et les étoiles qui constituent son immense domaine. Il voit tout, Il sait tout, et une larme de sang coule le long de Sa joue lorsqu'Il prend connaissance de nos pensées et de nos actes honteux dans les annales de nos vies. »
languages.original_text: "Forgive me if I've said something wrong, my {mf|lord|lady}. Preacher Antiochus said that the God-Emperor holds the Key to all Destinies in His celestial hand. He Himself sits at the very top of the Great Tower of Humankind, from there gazing out over the worlds and stars of His domain. He sees all, knows all, and a bloody tear rolls down His cheek when He reads our shameful thoughts and deeds in the annals of our lives."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-moi si j'ai dit quelque chose de mal, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. Le prêcheur Antiochus dit que l'Empereur-Dieu détient les clés de tous les destins dans Ses mains célestes. Assis au sommet de la grande tour de l'humanité, Il contemple les mondes et les étoiles qui constituent son immense domaine. Il voit tout, Il sait tout, et une larme de sang coule le long de Sa joue lorsqu'Il prend connaissance de nos pensées et de nos actes honteux dans les annales de nos vies. »

languages.text: "Vergebt mir, falls ich etwas Falsches gesagt habe, {mf|Herr|Herrin}. Prediger Antiochus sagte, der Gottimperator halte in Seiner himmlischen Hand den Schlüssel zu allen Schicksalen. Er selbst sitzt an der Spitze des Großen Turms der Menschheit, von wo aus Er die Welten und Sterne Seines Reichs überblickt. Er sieht und weiß alles, und eine blutige Träne läuft über Seine Wange, wenn er in den Annalen unserer Leben von unseren schändlichen Gedanken und Taten liest."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me if I've said something wrong, my {mf|lord|lady}. Preacher Antiochus said that the God-Emperor holds the Key to all Destinies in His celestial hand. He Himself sits at the very top of the Great Tower of Humankind, from there gazing out over the worlds and stars of His domain. He sees all, knows all, and a bloody tear rolls down His cheek when He reads our shameful thoughts and deeds in the annals of our lives."
